message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40, considering I'm the one who initiated the offer.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on Bob, meet me halfway. This is a better deal than my first offer.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm holding firm on this one. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Don't let the clock run out, Bob.
This is my final offer Alice. The clock is ticking, and frankly, I'd rather walk away with nothing than get a bad deal.
